description: This file defines a React component for displaying details of a note, including fetching data by ID, handling deletion, and rendering the note's title, content, and update time.

methods.name: NoteDetailPage
methods.description: React component displaying a note's detail, with data fetching, deletion, and rendering logic.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to load note data based on route parameter.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles delete confirmation and deletes note via useNotes hook.
